mapper.sql:
FROM eatja.infrMember a left join eatja.infrMemberAddress as b on b.infrMember_Seq = a.seq and b.ifmaDelNy = 0 left join eatja.infrMemberPhone as c on c.infrMember_Seq = a.seq and c.ifmpDelNy = 0 WHERE 1=1
AND a.ifmmDelNy = 1 AND a.ifmmDelNy = 0
AND ifmmName LIKE concat('%',#{shIfmmName},'%')
AND a.ifmmName LIKE concat('%',#{shValue},'%') AND a.ifmmId LIKE concat('%',#{shValue},'%')
AND a.regDateTime BETWEEN #{shDateStart} AND #{shDateEnd} AND a.modDateTime BETWEEN #{shDateStart} AND #{shDateEnd} AND a.ifmmBirthday BETWEEN #{shDateStart} AND #{shDateEnd}
mapper.select: SELECT seq , ifmmName FROM infrMember WHERE 1=1 AND ifmmDelNy = 0

SELECT a.seq ,a.ifmmName ,a.ifmmId ,a.ifmmPassword ,a.ifmmGenderCd ,a.ifmmBirthday ,a.ifmmRecommend ,a.ifmmEmailConsentNy ,a.ifmmPushConsentNy ,a.ifmmPersonerinfoCd ,a.regDateTime ,a.modDateTime ,a.ifmmRecommend ,a.ifmmDelNy ,b.imadAddress1 ,b.imadAddress2 ,c.ifmeEmailAccount ,c.ifmeEmailDomainCd ,d.ifmpTelecomCd ,d.ifmpNumber ,d.ifmpHomeTel FROM infrMember a left join eatja.infrMemberAddress as b on b.infrMember_Seq = a.seq and b.ifmaDelNy = 0 left join eatja.infrMemberEmail as c on c.infrMember_Seq = a.seq and c.ifmeDelNy = 0 left join eatja.infrMemberPhone as d on d.infrMember_Seq = a.seq and d.ifmpDelNy = 0 WHERE 1=1 and ifmmDelNy = 0 and seq = #{seq}
SELECT a.seq ,a.ifmmId FROM infrMember a WHERE 1=1 AND a.ifmmId = #{ifmmId}
SELECT a.seq ,a.ifmmId ,a.ifmmName FROM infrMember a WHERE 1=1 AND a.ifmmId = #{ifmmId} AND a.ifmmPassword = #{ifmmPassword}
